name: Dazeworks Pvt. Ltd.
description:
Dazeworks is your pure play consultant and partner for all things Salesforce – be it development, implementation or expert architectural guidance.
Our areas of expertise include
Force.com services such as app development,
Integration with Salesforce.com and Data migration
End to end consulting and Implementation
Dedicated Admins and Developers
Expert Consulting / Architect as a service
Customisation though APEX, Visualforce, Lightning
Appexchange App Building
Classic to Lightning Experience
Salesforce Communities (Custom and standard Communities)
Led by Salesforce.com & Force.com MVP Shivanath Devinarayanan, our team includes has a total of 11 MVPs spread out across 9 global locations - the largest network of MVPs under one organizational umbrella. 
We have offices in 
San Francisco, USA
Montana , USA
Idaho, USA
Ontario, Canada
London, United Kingdom
Colombo, Sri Lanka
Bangalore, India
Kochi, India
Delhi, India
Dubai, UAE
 
READ MORE...
